thread.title: Rosa String Works Band to perform in Newburg on Oct. 10
thread.title_full: Rosa String Works Band to perform in Newburg on Oct. 10

author: Staff Reports
title: Rosa String Works Band to perform in Newburg on Oct. 10
text: Rosa String Works Band to perform in Newburg on Oct. 10 The Rosa String Works Band will perform at the Lyric Live Theater in Newburg next weekend. Comment   Staff Reports Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 7:04 PM By Staff Reports Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 7:04 PM NEWBURG The Rosa String Works Band will perform at the Lyric Live Theater in Newburg next weekend. The band, comprised of Mark Raborn and Kevin Dowler both on guitar and vocals (and both super-pickers), Gary Heavin on vocals and rhythm guitar, Shirley Robertson on upright bass and vocals and Jerry Rosa on mandolin and vocals, will play Saturday, Oct. 10, at 7 p.m. Doors will open at 6:30 p.m. The theater is located at 117 First St., Newburg. Donations will be accepted as admission. Refreshments will be served at half-time at the nearby historical Houston House in Newburg. Parking is available across the street from the theater. Handicapped parking is available in front of the theater with handicapped access on the side of the building. By Staff Reports   Staff Reports
